==English==
{{wikipedia}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|fr|en}} {{term|consultant|lang=fr}}, present participle of {{term|consulter}}, from {{etyl|la|en}} {{term|consultare||to deliberate, consult|lang=la}}, frequentative of {{term|consulere||to consult, deliberate, consider, reflect upon, ask advice}}, from {{term|com-||together}} + {{term|-sulere}}, of uncertain origin.

===Noun===
{{en-noun}}

# a person or party that is [[consult]]ed.
# a person whose occupation is to be consulted for their expertise, advice, or help in an area or specialty.  Alternatively, a party whose business is to be similarly consulted.

====Related terms====
* [[consult]]
* [[consultancy]]
* [[consultative]]
* [[consultation]]
